API Reference¶

foo package¶

foo.bar module¶

A Python module.

foo.bar.baz(a, b=None)[source]¶

A Python function.

Here is some math:

\[a^2 + b^2 = c^2\]
Parameters
anumpy:array_like

An array_like parameter.

bpython:None or numpy:array_like, optional

An optional array_like parameter. If None (default), use a.

Returns
cndarray

An array.

Examples

>>> a = 3
>>> b = [4]
>>> foo.bar.baz(a, b)
array([5.])
>>> foo.bar.baz(a)
4.242640687119285
